text: Brielle Biermann I'm All for Gun Control... So, Get Off My Ass!!! Brielle Biermann Responds to Backlash Following Birthday Gift Gun EXCLUSIVE Brielle Biermann is scared of her own freakin'shadow... so excuse her for getting a gun on her birthday to protect herself, which she says there's NOTHING wrong with, so long as you're smart about it. We got Kim Zolciak's daughter at LAX Monday and asked her about her 21st birthday gift last month. As we reported... Brielle got a brand new customized Glock 43 complete with a rose gold slide.
